recipesJson.name: Doug's Stuff
recipesJson.author: wh1skeyk1ng
recipesJson.description:
An irresistibly sweet caramel apple cream with notes of cinnamon and brown sugar. More description and notes here-

 https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/4g49k0/recipe_dougs_stuff_an_irresistibly_sweet_bakery/

reviews.text: Although this is a little sweet for my tastes I love this mix. The story behind this creation and the breakdown of the flavors are what drew me in. This recipe is a bit involved but it is well worth the effort. Thank you wh1skeyk1ing !
